code: @Override public void configure(ContainerSpecification container) throws IOException {     if (ugi != null) {         // overlay the Hadoop user identity (w/ tokens)         container.getEnvironmentVariables().put("HADOOP_USER_NAME", ugi.getUserName()).     } }
public static Builder newBuilder() {     return new Builder(). }

comment: /**  * Configures the overlay using the current Hadoop user information (from {@link UserGroupInformation}).  */
code: /**  * Configures the overlay using the current Hadoop user information (from {@link UserGroupInformation}).  */ public Builder fromEnvironment(Configuration globalConfiguration) throws IOException {     ugi = UserGroupInformation.getCurrentUser().     return this. }
public HadoopUserOverlay build() {     return new HadoopUserOverlay(ugi). }
